subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: After announcing this United States Open would be the last tournament of his career, Andy Roddick has continued winning, this time dispatching Fabio Fognini to advance to the fourth round.
snippet: After announcing this United States Open would be the last tournament of his career, Andy Roddick has continued winning, this time dispatching Fabio Fognini to advance to the fourth round.
